description:
Just a relaxed little fpv session with Mr.PetitSoldat (https://www.instagram.com/petitsoldatfpv/) and Mr.Chlangly (https://www.instagram.com/chlangy_fpv/).
Caught some low hanging clouds and though this would make a nice short edit :)

Music: Stranger Things (Louis Futon Flip) (https://soundcloud.com/louisfutonbeats/stranger-things-louis-futon-flip) 



Drone Setup:
-GEPRC mark 4 6"
-T-Motor F40III Pro 1600kv
-Aikon AK32 20x20
-Talon F7 V2
-TBS Unify Pro HV
-Foxeer Falkor
-Foxeer lollipop
-Azure power BSP 6"
-Taranis x9D
-TBS crossfire micro TX / nano RX
-Skyzone Sky02
-Pagoda + patch antenna
-Gopro Hero6



Follow me on intsagram! 
https://www.instagram.com/nicolas_gaillard/

I spent a few days in the mountains and caught the wonderfull colors of this season from an aerial perspective with my DJI Phantom 2 & GoPro HERO4 Black edition.
Shot in 2.7K 60fps, downscaled to 1080p.
Edited with Adobe Premiere pro CS6 & After effects CS6
Graded with M31lut from Osiris pack + curves + MBL.
Music: Kasbo - World away

The result of an awesome week in Serre Chevalier, they worked real hard to open the slopes despite the dry weather so we could have a fun time shreding artificial snow, grass and rocks.
Hopefully snow is on its way !

Shot 100% on Gopro HERO4 Black edition:
2.7K 60fps, 1080p 120fps, 720p 240fps
Edited in Premiere Pro CC
Graded with custom VSCO lut and Lumetri tool
Aerials with DJI Phantom 2

Music : THE GEEK x VRV - it's because

A compilation of shots from this winter in the french alps with my FPV drone. Mixing things up with some freestyle skiing in the middle.

Music: Ekali & mossy. - Stay Hollow (https://soundcloud.com/ekalimusic/ekali-mossy-stay-hollow)

Follow me on intsagram! 
https://www.instagram.com/nicolas_gaillard/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nicolas_gaillard/

I recently got bored of the regular DJI type drones, so I hopped on the FPV train. Here is the result of my first week with my new quad, trying to add a cinematic touch.
I trained on a simulator for about 20h before the first flight.

I didn't mount the Gopro properly, so there is a significant amount of jello at times. Also I need to shoot at a higher resolution because the result looks a bit mushy after stabilisation (reelsteady) and color grading.

Music: billie eilish - hostage (sonn remix) (https://soundcloud.com/sonn)

Setup:
-FT270 frame
-T-Motor F40II Pro 1600kv
-35a EMax Bullet ESC's
-Armattan CL F4 FC
-TBS Unify Pro HV
-RunCam Swift 2
-TBS Triumph Antenna
-HQProp 6x3x3
-Taranis x9D
-TBS crossfire TX / nano RX
-Skyzone Sky02
-Pagoda + patch antenna
-Gopro Hero6

2min of some of my favorite FPV drone shots so far.
Also taking this opportunity to anounce I'll be working with Benoit Finck (https://www.instagram.com/benoitfinck/) from now on!

For shooting inquiries 🚁 : booking@fincky.tv

Music: THYLACINE - Moskva (https://soundcloud.com/thylacinew)

Follow me on Instagram for more! 
https://www.instagram.com/nicolas_gaillard/

Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/nicolas_gaillard/

Spent two month in Grenoble, a city surrounded by mountains, for my engineering internship at a company developing drones. I spent weekdays building drones, and weekends flying mine in the clouds and hiking in the surrounding landscapes. It couldn't have been better.

Technical details: 
- Shot on : DJI phantom 3 pro: 4K 24fps, ND32 filter
- Edited in Adobe Premiere Pro CC, After effects CC, Mocha pro v5
- Graded with custom luts and curves 

Music: Sober Rob - Salt (https://soundcloud.com/soberrob/salt)

Embark on a cinematic FPV journey, following skiers in the beautiful Alpine scenery of the US.

For those of you who know me, you know how much I love skiing. So when freeski legend Richard Permin called me to come shoot with my FPV drone on a ski trip in the US, it was a dream oppotunity. 
For about three weeks, we skied almost everyday, trying to make the most out of the conditions we got. This is the result.

Follow me on instagram! 
https://www.instagram.com/nicolas_gaillard/ 


Special thanks to:
Richard Permin / https://www.instagram.com/richardpermin/
Maxime Moulin / https://www.instagram.com/maximemoulin/
Conor Pelton / https://www.instagram.com/peltski/

Music :
Tourist - We Stayed Up All Night (feat. Ardyn)
(https://soundcloud.com/touristmusic/we-stayed-up-all-night-feat-ardyn)

Locations : 
Snowbird, Utah
Glacier 3000, Switzerland
Telluride, Colorado
Antelope Island, Utah

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nicolas_gaillard/

I went to the Reunion island to help shoot a music video, and I got to experience the most impressive and cinematic landscapes with my fpv drone.
I only had three days there, so it has been a real challenge to get as much shots as possible. There is so much more to see, I wish I have had more time to explore.

Music: San Holo - Show me (https://soundcloud.com/sanholobeats/show-me)

Drone Setup:
-FT270 frame
-T-Motor F40II Pro 1600kv
-35a EMax Bullet ESC's
-Armattan CL F4 FC
-TBS Unify Pro HV
-Foxeer Falkor
-TBS Triumph Antenna
-HQProp 6x2x4.5
-Taranis x9D
-TBS crossfire TX / nano RX
-Skyzone Sky02
-Pagoda + patch antenna
-Gopro Hero6


Downloads and re-distribution is not permited.
Please only use and share this embed code.


-Tags-
cinematic fpv, racing drone, freestyle drone, cinematography, gopro, stabilisation, reelsteady, reunion island, long range.

I made a few test shots in the mountain whit my new DIY glidecam, here is the result ! Not perfect but pretty cool.

Shot on GoPro HERO3 Black 

Music: Pretty lights - Lost and found (Odesza remix)

One year ago, I went on a trip to Hawaii with Beautiful Destinations.
Still some of my favourite fpv drone shots to date!
I only posted the trailer on my channel, so here is the full video for your eyeballs.

Thanks again to Tom Jauncey (https://www.instagram.com/tomjauncey/) and Sage Stephens (https://www.instagram.com/storyofsage/) for the awesome trip!

Music : San Holo - worthy (MICA Remix) (https://soundcloud.com/micalovesu)

I don't have much time to produce content these days because of my studies, but here is what I came up with a few days at Serre Chevalier Valley. I took advantage of both the sh**** weather and the bluebird days to try to make a cinematic video.
This was shot on a Nikon D3300 on a cheap tripod + a flying potato.
Graded with M31 lut + filmconvert
Enjoy :)

Swapped my phantom 2 for a phantom 3 a while ago, but never got to make a video.
 So I went to the Alps and took advantage of the epic scenery the mountains have to offer at that time of the year.

I feel like a lot of people tend to forget that a drone is a camera. A camera that flies, but still a camera. You still have to pay attention to composition, movements, angles, light etc... So in this video I tried to work on that, getting proper camera work in the air.

I wanted a slow pace and no fancy editing to just let the images talk for themselves. I hope you hear them :)

Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/nicolas_gaillard/

Technical details:
Shot on DJI phantom 3 Pro: 2.7k 30fps
Edited in Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015
Intro title made with After effects CS6
Graded with a custom lut and basic tools

Music: Glades - Drive (Mt Eden Remix) https://soundcloud.com/mtedenofficial/glades-drive-mt-eden-remix
